location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 911 from Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 15 August 1834, informs the Resident that the Superintendent of the Indian Navy has been directed to send to him for transmission to the Envoy at the Court of Persia a supply of bottled beer and Madeira wine for His Majesty the Shah [Fatḥ-‘Alī Shāh Qājār].
